content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Confidentiality Agreement for Finance, People Management (HR), and Talent Acquisition (TA) Related Systems and Files\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All staff handling personally identifiable information must read, understand and agree to comply with EPAM’s Work Instruction: Protection Rules for Units Processing Sensitive Personal Data, including its associated standards and procedures.   The Work Instruction can be found on EPAM’s Process Asset Library\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pal.epam.com/pal_method_plugin/guidances/supportingmaterials/DataPrivacyPolicies_79DA6B20.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As a user of Finance, HR and/or Talent Acquisition related systems, including, but not limited to: UPSA, Telescope, Payroll Systems, Compensation, VTS, Time, Feedback, Staffing Radar, Staffing Desk, SAP, Certent, UBS, CTC, Concur, CRS, FC Checklist, and HPAM, you must read, understand and agree to comply with your obligations as set out in this confidentially agreement by signing the duplicate copy and returning it for our records. This agreement does not replace your information responsibilities as set out in EPAM’S overarching information governance policies but reinforces some of the core requirements.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Any failure by you to comply with this agreement or EPAM’s Work Instruction: Protection Rules for Units Processing Sensitive Personal Data, including its associated standards and procedures, may result in disciplinary action, including immediate dismissal for gross or serious misconduct. There may also be criminal penalties for breaches of privacy or confidentiality.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"By signing this agreement, you agree:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"to ensure that any information you create, receive, hold or transmit through the Finance, HR and/or Talent Acquisition systems is handled securely and confidentially at all times;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"to only access and use personally identifiable or confidential information for the purposes of your role;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"to not use any such information for personal gain or benefit;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"to only discuss or divulge such information in the performance of your normal work duties and with EPAM staff or vendors if they require access to that information for legitimate business reasons. If you are unsure, please contact your line manager; \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"to keep your password strictly confidential and not allow anyone (whether in Finance/HR/Talent Acquisition or not) to use your username or password to access EPAM’s IT, Finance and People Management systems;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"to inform\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:privacy@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" privacy@epam.com\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" immediately if you suspect that EPAM’s IT, Finance, People Management, or Talent Acquisition related systems have been compromised or someone has had unauthorised access to personally identifiable or confidential information; \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"to inform your manager immediately if you no longer need access to Finance, People Management, or Talent Acquisition related systems (for example due to a change in your role or responsibilities) or you consider you have been granted excessive rights to view or process personally identifiable or confidential information (for example, seeing data of employees outside of your role’s geographic region).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
